title: Social Media Editor
job_overview:
We are seeking a skilled social media editor to produce engaging short and long-form videos for our platforms. The ideal candidate should have a strong command of video editing software and excel in communication to effectively understand our vision. Your role will involve collaborating with our team to bring creative ideas to life, ensuring that content is tailored to our audience.

Our company has multiple clients for whom we produce 15-30 videos per month. We are looking for an editor who is looking for full-time work at 15$ per clip and edit. This person must communicate with my team through Upgrade to see actual info and have access to Premiere Pro for all editing. We produce high-quality, creative, and BROLL filled short-form and long-form videos for clients.

If you fit the criteria mentioned above, please reach out to me so we can set up a call.
